title: India, US strengthen energy ties
description: The power ministry met with a US delegation led by John Podesta to explore technical exchanges and financial support for modernizing India's energy infrastructure. Discussions included upgrading transmission systems, increasing manufacturing capacity for large transformers, and partnering on energy storage studies. Both sides emphasized the importance of deepening their cooperation in driving the global clean energy transition.
